body: hi all I have a problem when I want to enter the server ts3 Avicus not let me since my pc but from my grandmother and my aunt let me can someone help me please?

replies.body: Maybe it is your firewall in your router blocking it although you can connect to the minecraft server so that's a little wierd.. I'm honestly not sure and not the most tech savy guy. You might want to try asking here: http://forum.teamspeak.com/forumdisplay.php/99-Client-Support

replies.body:
A few people have had this problem before with the Avicus TS, I would suggest re-installing TeamSpeak and making sure your firewall isn't blocking anything.

Also, do other servers work for you?
replies.body_tagged:

Also, do other servers work for you?
